title: The Solar system. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Thomas Smith
brief_description: Investigates the structure and composition of the solar system, describes the origin of the Sun and its planets and surveys the major planetary bodies in the solar system. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
